Bash(DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE=Schuch.settings python -c "
import os
import django
os.environ.setdefault(''DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE'', ''Schuch.settings'')
django.setup()

from accounts.models import CustomUser
from email_templates.trigger_manager import EmailTriggerManager

# Test mit einer echten Gmail-Adresse
test_email = ''test.user.workloom@gmail.com''

# √úberpr√ºfe ob User bereits existiert
if CustomUser.objects.filter(email=test_email).exists():
    CustomUser.objects.filter(email=test_email).delete()
    print(f''Existing user {test_email} deleted'')

# Erstelle neuen Test-User
user = CustomUser.objects.create_user(
    username=f''testuser{hash(test_email) % 10000}'',
    email=test_email,
    password=''TestPass123!'',
    is_email_verified=False
)

print(f''‚úÖ Created test user: {user.username} ({user.email})'')
print(f''üìß Verification token: {user.email_verification_token[:20]}...'')

# Trigger Email-Versendung
trigger_manager = EmailTriggerManager()
results = trigger_manager.trigger_event(''user_registration'', {
    ''user_id'': user.id,
    ''user_email'': user.email,
    ''user_name'': user.username,
    ''verification_token'': user.email_verification_token,
    ''site_domain'': ''localhost:8001''
})

print(f''üìß Trigger results: {results}'')

# Pr√ºfe Email-Logs
from email_templates.models import EmailLog
recent_logs = EmailLog.objects.filter(recipient_email=test_email).order_by(''-sent_at'')[:3]
print(f''üìù Found {len(recent_logs)} recent logs for {test_email}'')
for log in recent_logs:
    print(f''   {log.sent_at} - {log.status} - {log.subject}'')
    if log.error_message:
        print(f''   ‚ùå Error: {log.error_message}'')
    else:
        print(f''   ‚úÖ Success'')
")

import os
import django
os.environ.setdefault(''DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE'', ''Schuch.settings'')
django.setup()

from accounts.models import CustomUser
from email_templates.trigger_manager import TriggerManager

# Test mit einer echten Gmail-Adresse
test_email = ''test.user.workloom@gmail.com''

# √úberpr√ºfe ob User bereits existiert
if CustomUser.objects.filter(email=test_email).exists():
    CustomUser.objects.filter(email=test_email).delete()
    print(f''Existing user {test_email} deleted'')

# Erstelle neuen Test-User
user = CustomUser.objects.create_user(
    username=f''testuser{hash(test_email) % 10000}'',
    email=test_email,
    password=''TestPass123!'',
    is_email_verified=False
)

print(f''‚úÖ Created test user: {user.username} ({user.email})'')
print(f''üìß Verification token: {user.email_verification_token[:20]}...'')

# Trigger Email-Versendung
trigger_manager = TriggerManager()
results = trigger_manager.trigger_event(''user_registration'', {
    ''user_id'': user.id,
    ''user_email'': user.email,
    ''user_name'': user.username,
    ''verification_token'': user.email_verification_token,
    ''site_domain'': ''localhost:8001''
})

print(f''üìß Trigger results: {results}'')

# Pr√ºfe Email-Logs
from email_templates.models import EmailLog
recent_logs = EmailLog.objects.filter(recipient_email=test_email).order_by(''-sent_at'')[:3]
print(f''üìù Found {len(recent_logs)} recent logs for {test_email}'')
for log in recent_logs:
    print(f''   {log.sent_at} - {log.status} - {log.subject}'')
    if log.error_message:
        print(f''   ‚ùå Error: {log.error_message}'')
    else:
        print(f''   ‚úÖ Success: Email delivered via {log.smtp_host}:{log.smtp_port}'')
        
# Pr√ºfe SuperConfig Status
from superconfig.models import EmailConfiguration
active_config = EmailConfiguration.get_active_config()
if active_config:
    print(f''üìß Active SuperConfig: {active_config.email_host_user} via {active_config.smtp_host}:{active_config.smtp_port}'')
else:
    print(''‚ùå No active SuperConfig found'')
")

import os
import django
os.environ.setdefault(''DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE'', ''Schuch.settings'')
django.setup()

from accounts.models import CustomUser
from email_templates.trigger_manager import TriggerManager

# Test mit einer echten Gmail-Adresse

# √úberpr√ºfe ob User bereits existiert

    print(f''Existing user {test_email} deleted'')

# Erstelle neuen Test-User
user = CustomUser.objects.create_user(
    username=f''testuser{hash(test_email) % 10000}'',
    email=test_email,
    password=''TestPass123!''
)
user.email_verified = False
user.save()

print(f''‚úÖ Created test user: {user.username} ({user.email})'')
print(f''üìß Verification token: {user.email_verification_token[:20] if user.email_verification_token else ""None""}...'')

# Trigger Email-Versendung
trigger_manager = TriggerManager()
results = trigger_manager.trigger_event(''user_registration'', {
    ''user_id'': user.id,
    ''user_email'': user.email,
    ''user_name'': user.username,
    ''verification_token'': user.email_verification_token,
    ''site_domain'': ''localhost:8001''
})

print(f''üìß Trigger results: {results}'')

# Pr√ºfe Email-Logs
from email_templates.models import EmailLog
recent_logs = EmailLog.objects.filter(recipient_email=test_email).order_by(''-sent_at'')[:3]
print(f''üìù Found {len(recent_logs)} recent logs for {test_email}'')
for log in recent_logs:
    print(f''   {log.sent_at} - {log.status} - {log.subject}'')
    if log.error_message:
        print(f''   ‚ùå Error: {log.error_message}'')
    else:
        print(f''   ‚úÖ Success: Email delivered via {log.smtp_host}:{log.smtp_port}'')
        
# Pr√ºfe SuperConfig Status
from superconfig.models import EmailConfiguration
active_config = EmailConfiguration.get_active_config()
if active_config:
    print(f''üìß Active SuperConfig: {active_config.email_host_user} via {active_config.smtp_host}:{active_config.smtp_port}'')
else:
    print(''‚ùå No active SuperConfig found'')
")

Bash(DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE=Schuch.settings python -c "
import os
import django
os.environ.setdefault(''DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE'', ''Schuch.settings'')
django.setup()

from accounts.models import CustomUser
from email_templates.trigger_manager import TriggerManager

# Test mit einer echten Gmail-Adresse
test_email = ''test.user.workloom@gmail.com''

# √úberpr√ºfe ob User bereits existiert
if CustomUser.objects.filter(email=test_email).exists():
    CustomUser.objects.filter(email=test_email).delete()
    print(f''Existing user {test_email} deleted'')

# Erstelle neuen Test-User
user = CustomUser.objects.create_user(
    username=f''testuser{hash(test_email) % 10000}'',
    email=test_email,
    password=''TestPass123!''
)
user.email_verified = False
user.save()

print(f''‚úÖ Created test user: {user.username} ({user.email})'')
print(f''üìß Verification token: {user.email_verification_token[:20] if user.email_verification_token else ""None""}...'')

# Trigger Email-Versendung mit fire_trigger
trigger_manager = TriggerManager()
results = trigger_manager.fire_trigger(''user_registration'', 
    context_data={
        ''user_id'': user.id,
        ''user_name'': user.username,
        ''username'': user.username,
        ''email'': user.email,
        ''verification_token'': user.email_verification_token,
        ''site_domain'': ''localhost:8001''
    },
    recipient_email=user.email,
    recipient_name=user.username
)

print(f''üìß Trigger results: {results}'')

# Pr√ºfe Email-Logs
from email_templates.models import EmailLog
recent_logs = EmailLog.objects.filter(recipient_email=test_email).order_by(''-sent_at'')[:3]
print(f''üìù Found {len(recent_logs)} recent logs for {test_email}'')
for log in recent_logs:
    print(f''   {log.sent_at} - {log.status} - {log.subject}'')
    if log.error_message:
        print(f''   ‚ùå Error: {log.error_message}'')
    else:
        print(f''   ‚úÖ Success: Email delivered via {log.smtp_host}:{log.smtp_port}'')
        
# Pr√ºfe SuperConfig Status
from superconfig.models import EmailConfiguration
active_config = EmailConfiguration.get_active_config()
if active_config:
    print(f''üìß Active SuperConfig: {active_config.email_host_user} via {active_config.smtp_host}:{active_config.smtp_port}'')
    # Test connection
    test_result = active_config.test_connection()
    print(f''üìß Connection test: {test_result}'')
else:
    print(''‚ùå No active SuperConfig found'')
")

Bash(DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE=Schuch.settings python -c "
import os
import django
os.environ.setdefault(''DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE'', ''Schuch.settings'')
django.setup()

from accounts.models import CustomUser
from email_templates.trigger_manager import TriggerManager
from email_templates.models import EmailSendLog, EmailTrigger, EmailTemplate

print(''üìä Checking trigger system setup...'')

# Check if user_registration trigger exists
try:
    trigger = EmailTrigger.objects.get(trigger_key=''user_registration'')
    print(f''‚úÖ Found trigger: {trigger.name}'')
    
    # Check associated templates
    templates = trigger.templates.filter(is_active=True)
    print(f''üìã Found {len(templates)} active templates for user_registration'')
    for template in templates:
        print(f''   - {template.name}: {template.subject}'')
        
except EmailTrigger.DoesNotExist:
    print(''‚ùå user_registration trigger not found in database'')
    # Sync triggers
    trigger_manager = TriggerManager()
    trigger_manager.sync_triggers_to_database()
    print(''üìä Synced triggers to database'')

# Test mit einer echten Gmail-Adresse
test_email = ''test.user.workloom@gmail.com''

# √úberpr√ºfe ob User bereits existiert
if CustomUser.objects.filter(email=test_email).exists():
    existing_user = CustomUser.objects.filter(email=test_email).first()
    print(f''Found existing user {existing_user.username}, token: {existing_user.email_verification_token}'')
    user = existing_user
else:
    # Erstelle neuen Test-User
    user = CustomUser.objects.create_user(
        username=f''testuser{hash(test_email) % 10000}'',
        email=test_email,
        password=''TestPass123!''
    )
    user.email_verified = False
    user.save()
    print(f''‚úÖ Created test user: {user.username} ({user.email})'')

print(f''üìß User verification token: {user.email_verification_token[:20] if user.email_verification_token else ""None""}...'')

# Trigger Email-Versendung mit fire_trigger
trigger_manager = TriggerManager()
print(f''üî• Firing user_registration trigger...'')
results = trigger_manager.fire_trigger(''user_registration'', 
    context_data={
        ''user_id'': user.id,
        ''user_name'': user.username,
        ''username'': user.username,
        ''email'': user.email,
        ''verification_token'': user.email_verification_token,
        ''site_domain'': ''localhost:8001''
    },
    recipient_email=user.email,
    recipient_name=user.username
)

print(f''üìß Trigger results: {results}'')

# Pr√ºfe Email-Logs
recent_logs = EmailSendLog.objects.filter(recipient_email=test_email).order_by(''-sent_at'')[:5]
print(f''üìù Found {len(recent_logs)} recent logs for {test_email}'')
for i, log in enumerate(recent_logs):
    print(f''   {i+1}. {log.sent_at} - {log.status} - {log.subject[:50]}'')
    if log.error_message:
        print(f''      ‚ùå Error: {log.error_message}'')
    else:
        print(f''      ‚úÖ Success: Email delivered via {log.smtp_host}:{log.smtp_port}'')
")

Bash(DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE=Schuch.settings python -c "
import os
import django
os.environ.setdefault(''DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE'', ''Schuch.settings'')
django.setup()

from accounts.models import CustomUser
import uuid

# √úberpr√ºfe, wann und wo email_verification_token gesetzt wird
test_email = ''test.user.workloom@gmail.com''
user = CustomUser.objects.get(email=test_email)

print(f''User {user.username}:'')
print(f''  - email_verified: {user.email_verified}'')
print(f''  - email_verification_token: {user.email_verification_token}'')
print(f''  - email_verification_sent_at: {user.email_verification_sent_at}'')

# Manuell Token setzen wie in views.py
user.email_verification_token = str(uuid.uuid4())
user.save()

print(f''‚úÖ Token updated: {user.email_verification_token}'')
")

Bash(DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE=Schuch.settings python -c "
import os
import django
os.environ.setdefault(''DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE'', ''Schuch.settings'')
django.setup()

from accounts.models import CustomUser
from email_templates.models import EmailSendLog

# Test mit neuer Gmail-Adresse
test_email = ''final.test.workloom@gmail.com''

# User l√∂schen falls vorhanden
if CustomUser.objects.filter(email=test_email).exists():
    CustomUser.objects.filter(email=test_email).delete()
    print(f''Deleted existing user: {test_email}'')

# Erstelle User wie bei echter Registrierung
user = CustomUser.objects.create_user(
    username=f''finaltest{hash(test_email) % 10000}'',
    email=test_email,
    password=''TestPass123!''
)
user.is_active = False  # Nicht aktiv bis E-Mail best√§tigt
user.save()

print(f''‚úÖ Created user: {user.username} ({user.email})'')

# Teste send_verification_email Funktion
from accounts.views import send_verification_email
from django.test import RequestFactory

# Erstelle Mock-Request
factory = RequestFactory()
request = factory.get(''/accounts/signup/'')
request.META[''HTTP_HOST''] = ''localhost:8001''

# Sende Verifikations-E-Mail
result = send_verification_email(user, request)
print(f''üìß Email send result: {result}'')

# Pr√ºfe Token
user.refresh_from_db()
print(f''üìß Verification token generated: {user.email_verification_token[:20] if user.email_verification_token else ""None""}...'')
print(f''üìß Token sent at: {user.email_verification_sent_at}'')

# Pr√ºfe Email-Logs
recent_logs = EmailSendLog.objects.filter(recipient_email=test_email).order_by(''-sent_at'')[:3]
print(f''üìù Found {len(recent_logs)} recent logs for {test_email}'')
for log in recent_logs:
    print(f''   {log.sent_at} - {log.status} - {log.subject[:60]}...'')
    if log.error_message:
        print(f''   ‚ùå Error: {log.error_message}'')
    else:
        print(f''   ‚úÖ Success: Email sent via {log.smtp_host}:{log.smtp_port}'')
")

Bash(DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE=Schuch.settings python -c "
import os
import django
os.environ.setdefault(''DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE'', ''Schuch.settings'')
django.setup()

from email_templates.models import EmailSendLog

# Pr√ºfe Email-Logs mit korrekten Feldnamen
recent_logs = EmailSendLog.objects.filter(recipient_email=''final.test.workloom@gmail.com'').order_by(''-sent_at'')[:3]
print(f''üìù Found {len(recent_logs)} recent logs for final.test.workloom@gmail.com'')
for log in recent_logs:
    status = ''SUCCESS'' if log.is_sent else ''FAILED''
    print(f''   {log.sent_at} - {status} - {log.subject[:60]}...'')
    if log.error_message:
        print(f''   ‚ùå Error: {log.error_message}'')
    else:
        print(f''   ‚úÖ Success: Email delivered successfully'')
        print(f''   üìß Template: {log.template.name if log.template else ""N/A""}'')
        if log.connection:
            print(f''   üîó Connection: {log.connection.name}'')
")
